item.title: Introducing Amazon EMR Serverless for Apache Spark
item.description: Learn how Amazon EMR Serverless makes it easier to run Apache Spark applications without managing infrastructure.
item.content:encoded:
Amazon EMR Serverless is a new deployment option for Amazon EMR that makes it easy for data analysts and engineers to run open-source big data analytics frameworks without configuring, managing, scaling, or tuning clusters.

Key Benefits

  • Serverless: No infrastructure management
  • Cost-effective: Pay only for what you use
  • Fast startup: Applications start in seconds

This makes it ideal for ad-hoc analysis and batch processing workloads.

item.title: Best practices for Amazon Redshift performance optimization
item.description: Discover techniques to improve your Amazon Redshift query performance and reduce costs.
item.content:encoded:
Amazon Redshift is a fast, fully managed data warehouse that makes it simple and cost-effective to analyze all your data using standard SQL and your existing Business Intelligence (BI) tools.

Here are some key optimization strategies:

  1. Choose the right distribution keys
  2. Use appropriate sort keys
  3. Optimize table design
